name: 1-Palmitoyl-2-oleoyl-sn-glycero-3-(phospho-rac-(1-glycerol))
description: A synthetic lung surfactant used to treat infant respiratory distress syndrome.

name: 1,2-Benzodiazepine
description: Benzodiazepine is under investigation for the prevention of Delirium and C.Surgical Procedure; Cardiac. Benzodiazepine has been investigated for the treatment of Obesity, Sleep Apnea, Obstructive, and Disorders of Gallbladder, Biliary...

name: 1,2-Distearoyllecithin
description: Not Annotated

name: 1,2-icosapentoyl-sn-glycero-3-phosphoserine
description: Not Annotated

name: 2-mercaptobenzothiazole
description: Not Annotated

name: 2,2'-Dibenzothiazyl disulfide
description: 2,2'-Dibenzothiazyl disulfide is approved for use within allergenic epicutaneous patch tests which are indicated for use as an aid in the diagnosis of allergic contact dermatitis (ACD) in persons 6...

name: 4-(Isopropylamino)diphenylamine
description: 4-(Isopropylamino)diphenylamine is approved for use within allergenic epicutaneous patch tests which are indicated for use as an aid in the diagnosis of allergic contact dermatitis (ACD) in persons 6 years...

name: 5-O-phosphono-alpha-D-ribofuranosyl diphosphate
description: The key substance in the biosynthesis of histidine, tryptophan, and purine and pyrimidine nucleotides.

name: Abacavir
description: An antiviral nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor used in combination with other antiretrovirals for the treatment of HIV.

name: Abametapir
description: A pediculicide metalloproteinase used topically in the treatment of head lice infection.

name: Abarelix
description: For palliative treatment of advanced prostate cancer.

name: Abemaciclib
description: A medication used to treat HR+ HER2- advanced or metastatic breast cancer.

name: Abiraterone
description: An antiandrogen used in the treatment of prostate cancer.

name: Abrocitinib
description: A kinase inhibitor used to treat moderate-to-severe atopic dermatitis in adults.

name: Acalabrutinib
description: A Bruton tyrosine kinase inhibitor used to treat mantle cell lymphoma, chronic lymphocytic leukemia, and small lymphocytic lymphoma.

name: Acamprosate
description: A medication used to maintain alcohol abstinence in patients with alcohol dependence.

name: Acarbose
description: An alpha-glucosidase inhibitor used in adjunctly with diet and exercise for the management of glycemic control in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus.

name: Acebutolol
description: A selective β1-receptor antagonist used for the management of hypertension and ventricular premature beats in adults.

name: Aceclidine
description: Aceclidine has been marketed in Europe but has not been used clinically in the United States. It is used in the treatment of open-angle glaucoma and is a parasympathomimetic agent.

name: Aceclofenac
description: Aceclofenac is indicated for the relief of pain and inflammation in osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis and ankylosing spondylitis.
categories: Acetic Acid Derivatives and Related Substances

name: Acemetacin
description: A NSAID indicated in the treatment of pain and inflammation.
categories: Acetic Acid Derivatives and Related Substances

name: Acenocoumarol
description: An anticoagulant drug used in the prevention of thromboembolic diseases in infarction and transient ischemic attacks, as well as management of deep vein thrombosis and myocardial infarction.

name: Acetaminophen
description: An analgesic drug used alone or in combination with opioids for pain management, and as an antipyretic agent.

name: Acetarsol
description: An anti infective used to treat a wide variety of infections in the body.

name: Acetazolamide
description: A carbonic anhydrase inhibitor used to treat edema from heart failure or medications, certain types of epilepsy, and glaucoma.

name: Acetic acid
description: An antimicrobial agent used to treat susceptible infections of the external auditory canal.

name: Acetohexamide
description: Used in the management of diabetes mellitus type 2 (adult-onset).

name: Acetohydroxamic acid
description: A synthetic urea derivative used to treat urea splitting bacterial infections of the urinary tract.

name: Acetophenazine
description: For the treatment of disorganized and psychotic thinking. Also used to help treat false perceptions (e.g. hallucinations or delusions.)

name: Acetyl sulfisoxazole
description: Acute, recurrent or chronic urinary tract infections (primarily pyelonephritis, pyelitis and cystitis) due to susceptible organisms (usually Escherichia coli, Klebsiella-Enterobacter, staphylococcus, Proteus mirabilis and, less frequently, Proteus vulgaris) in the...

name: Acetylcarnitine
description: An acetylated form of the amino acid derivative L-carnitine that assists in mitochondrial fatty acid metabolism. It is under investigation as a treatment for numerous conditions, including neuropathy, depression, and dementia.

name: Acetylcholine
description: A parasympathomimetic neurotransmitter used to induce miosis of the iris in seconds after delivery of the lens in cataract surgery, in penetrating keratoplasty, iridectomy and other anterior segment surgery where rapid miosis may be required.

name: Acetylcysteine
description: A medication that can be used as a mucolytic in patients with certain lung conditions and as an antidote for acetaminophen overdose.

name: Acetyldigitoxin
description: Used for fast digitalization in congestive heart failure.

name: Acetylene
description: A component of a medical gas indicated for lung function testing.

name: Acetylsalicylic acid
description: A salicylate used to treat pain, fever, inflammation, migraines, and reducing the risk of major adverse cardiovascular events.

name: Acipimox
description: A niacin derivative used in Fredrickson type IIb and type IV hyperlipoproteinemia.

name: Acitretin
description: An oral retinoid used in the treatment of severe psoriasis.

name: Aclidinium
description: An inhaled long-acting anticholinergic used as a maintenance bronchodilator in patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).

name: Acrivastine
description: An antihistamine agent used for the symptomatic relief of seasonal allergic rhinitis such as sneezing, rhinorrhea, pruritus, lacrimation, and nasal congestion.

name: Activated charcoal
description: A gastric decontamination agent used in emergency clinical settings as a antidote to treat poisonings following excessive oral ingestion of certain medications or poisons.

name: Acyclovir
description: A guanosine analog used to treat herpes simplex, varicella zoster, herpes zoster.
categories: Nucleosides and Nucleotides Excl. Reverse Transcriptase Inhibitors

name: Adagrasib
description: A KRAS inhibitor indicated for the treatment of locally advanced or metastatic KRAS G12C-mutated non-small cell lung cancer in patients who have received at least one prior systemic therapy.

name: Adapalene
description: A third-generation topical retinoid with anti-comedogenic, comedolytic, and anti-inflammatory properties used to treat acne vulgaris in adolescents and adults.
categories: Retinoids for Topical Use in Acne

name: Adefovir dipivoxil
description: A nucleotide analog used to treat chronic hepatitis B.
categories: Nucleoside and Nucleotide Reverse Transcriptase Inhibitors

name: Ademetionine
description: S-Adenosylmethionine (SAMe) is used as a drug in Europe for the treatment of depression, liver disorders, fibromyalgia, and osteoarthritis. It has also been introduced into the United States market as...

name: Adenine
description: A purine base which forms a component of DNA among other functions and is present in many multivitamins.

name: Adenosine
description: A medication used in myocardial perfusion scintigraphy and to treat supraventricular tachycardia.

name: Adenosine phosphate
description: For nutritional supplementation, also for treating dietary shortage or imbalance

name: Adiphenine
description: Not Annotated
